Archived releases of the data, and the code used to generate them, are available on [Github](https://github.com/Economic/owe/releases).

## Version 1.0.0
- First public release of the data.

- Added Brummund and Strain 2020
- Removed Belman Wolfson 2010 due to time series variation only
